a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of child deaths by source, World
The estimated annual number of deaths in children under five years old. Estimates from different sources are
compared: the UN Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation (UN IGME), the UN World Population
Prospects (UN WPP), and the IHME's Global Burden of Disease study.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024); UN, World Population Prospects (2024); United Nations Inter-agency Group for
